title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9750.4 - Correction of error
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9750.4 - Correction of error

State Regulations

When a fair hearing decision has ordered the correction of a
discontinuance, the correction of a denial of an application for benefits or
the correction of the amount of cost-sharing responsibilities, a payment shall
be made to the appellant to cover the full amount to which he/she was entitled
in accordance with the decision for the entire period from the date the
incorrect action was taken. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
9750.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
